name: Western Gunfight Challenge
description:
The excitement of western style gunfighting and target practice on your iPhone or iPad.

Turn and tilt your device to line it up your gun with the target. Then tap the screen to fire. Seven challenging levels with stationary and moving targets, single and double skeet shooting, and western style duels against three bad guys.

Optionally shares your accomplishments with Facebook, Twitter, Weibo, email, or instant messaging.

Universal App - supports iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad, including standard, Retina, and iPhone 5 displays.
